abstract: Clementa Carlos Pinckney, who was martyred in Charleston's Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church, had precocious career, including becoming youngest elected black member of South Carolina's legislature at 23; he was appointed to lead prestigious pulpit of Emanuel, at 36; Pres Obama will deliver eulogy at his funeral.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Pinckney, who was killed last week in the basement of Charleston’s Emanuel A.M.E. church, often said he was summoned to the pulpit at an early age.

headline.main: Clementa Pinckney, Called to Pulpit and Politics in a Life Cut Short
headline.print_headline: Called to Pulpit, Then to Politics in Life Cut Short

snippet: Mr. Pinckney, who was killed last week in the basement of Charleston’s Emanuel A.M.E. church, often said he was summoned to the pulpit at an early age.

keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)
keywords.name: organizations
